alert.note: Alert for Alamosa; Conejos; Costilla; Rio Grande; Saguache (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 22 at 3:39PM MDT until April 22 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Alamosa County in southeastern Colorado... Eastern Rio Grande County in south central Colorado... South central Saguache County in central Colorado... West central Costilla County in south central Colorado... Northeastern Conejos County in south central Colorado... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 339 PM MDT, a dust channel was over Alamosa East, or over Alamosa, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Highway 160 and Highway 285. Locations impacted include... Alamosa, Monte Vista, Center, Hooper, Alamosa East, San Luis Lake, Mosca and Great Sand Dunes. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

area.areaDesc: Alamosa; Conejos; Costilla; Rio Grande; Saguache
